content: to 67 yellow st s stitch es row 68 to 73 orange st st stockinette row 74 to 79 pink decrease together row 80 to 85 white ws wrong side row 86 to 91 pale blue break the pale blue yarn and join green yarn for knitting pattern the head caterpillar row 92 knit make 1 cast on 10 sts in denim blue on 3mm row 93 purl needles start at the bottom end row 94 k1 kfb k1 8 times k1 26 sts row 1 ws purl row 95 purl row 2 rs k1 kfb 8 times k1 18 sts row 96 k1 kfb k5 4 times k1 30 sts row 3 to 7 starting and ending on a ws purl row work 5 row in st st row 97 to 103 starting and ending on a ws purl row work 7 row in st st break the denim blue working yarn row 104 k1 k2tog k2 7times k1 23 sts work row 8 to 91 in st st working 6 row stripes/ colour blocks of colour starting on a rs knit row row 105 purl and ending on a ws purl row break the working row 106 k1 k2tog k1 7times k1 16 sts yarn and join the new yarn colour at each colour row 107 purl change row in the following order row 108 k1 k2tog 7 times k1 9 sts row 8 to 13 pale blue pull through to cast off row 14 to 19 green rainbow caterpillar copyright © 2020 amanda berry page 2 of 3 antennae make 2 cast on 4 sts in green yarn on 3mm needles row 1 to 5 starting and ending on a ws purl row work 5 row in st st row 6 k1 kfb kfb k1 6 sts row 7 purl pull through to cast off making up caterpillar starting at the cast off end sew the side edges decrease stuffing as you sew note the seam runs down the underside of the body roll the antennae using the cast off tail sew the side caterpillar like a rolling pin so that the stuffing is edges decrease and sew the cast on end onto the top of evenly spread throughout then gather the cast on the head sts decrease at the bottom end for each body colour section cut a 20cm length of yarn in the body features cut two 11mm diameter circles in white section colour thread onto a darning needle and felt fabric for the eyes using the black thread sew sew a long running stitch around the body over the beads on top of these circles on the head in front of colour change row pull the ends of the yarn firmly the antennae use the black thread to embroider a to gather in the knitting to make an indentation smiley mouth on the front of the head cut two knot to secure the yarn and bury the yarn tails 8mm diameter circles in pink
